promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a young strong bear steel-type pokemon with white fur. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Alpinuron, a a young strong bear steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Turn Back Time, Twilight Inspiration. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "steel" or "Alpinuron". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bear-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In rugged peaks prowls this mighty creature, obdurate and youthful. Alpinuron's unique power to rewind time and its Twilight Inspiration leave foes shivering.
